local_intent: Align to the T-block, set yaw to 90 deg, push it 0.2 toward the target, and verify arrival at target_T with retry.
assumptions: Target frame and block are detectable
Yaw 90 aligns with desired push direction
coherence_with_global: Replicates visibility checks for block and target, aligns, sets yaw, performs push with retry, then verifies IsAt target_T. Omits retreat to keep micro-goal minimal.
